title: gambeera gaandharva
sahitya:
gambhIra gAndharva gAna vilOla

ambikai magizhum guha saravaNa bAla

(gambhIra)

anupallavi

anbaruLLam ANDa endan kandA vaDivElA

inbam niRai innisai tanda aruLALA

(gambhIra)

caraNam

shankarAbharaNanai aruginil amartti

OmkArap poruL uRaitta guru unadu kIrtti

sangaTam tIrkkum undan karangaLin nErtti

mangalangaL tandaruLum endan skanda mUrtti

madyama kAlam

pAda malar pORRiDum pAvalarkkaruL puriya

nAdamaya candamdanil nALum naTam seyum vara (gambhIra)
